shortdesc.ph: Allows a user to rate a call after the call ends.

p.codeblock: public abstract int rate(String callId, int rating, String description);
UFUNCTION(BlueprintCallable, Category = "Agora|RtcEngineProxy") int Rate(FString callId, int rating, FString description);
abstract rate(callId: string, rating: number, description: string): number;
public abstract int Rate(string callId, int rating, string description);
abstract rate(callId: string, rating: number, description: string): number;
Future<void> rate( {required String callId, required int rating, required String description});

section.title: Details
section.note: Ensure that you call this method after leaving a channel.

plentry.pd: The current call ID. You can get the call ID by calling .
The value is between 1 (the lowest score) and 5 (the highest score).

pd.ph: A description of the call. The string length should be less than 800 bytes.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.props: native unreal bp electron unity rn cs
ul.li:
< 0: Failure. See for details and resolution suggestions.
-1: A general error occurs (no specified reason).
-2: The parameter is invalid.
